docs.abstract: New York Yankees beat Seattle Mariners, 2-1.

docs.snippet: Matt Harvey, who left Saturday’s loss with tightness in his lower back, said Sunday he felt fine. He is expected to start Thursday on regular rest....
docs.lead_paragraph: Matt Harvey, who left Saturday’s loss with tightness in his lower back, said Sunday he felt fine. He is expected to start Thursday on regular rest.
docs.abstract: New York Mets pitcher Matt Harvey, who left game with tightness in his lower back in loss to Miami Marlins, says he is fine and will not miss his next start.

headline.seo: Matt Harvey Will Not Miss a Start
headline.main: Harvey Is Fine After Tightness in Back

docs.abstract: Japanese baseball team Fukuoka SoftBank Hawks expressed interest in 2012 in obtaining New York Yankees third baseman Alex Rodriguez, but got no response from Yankees.
